channel.title: Devs on Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D.

item.title: New Study: Game Developers' Self-Directed Learning
item.description: Study Overview In this study, we are exploring self-directed learning (SDL) among game developers, investigating how you acquire and enhance skills in an industry marked by rapid technological evolution and shifting consumer interests.
